title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Jul 8 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Jul 8 2022
description:
Supreme Court Justice Brett Kavanaugh had to exit through the rear of Morton's Steakhouse after D.C. protestors showed up out front. Morton's Steakhouse statement: "Politics … should not trample the freedom at play of the right to congregate and eat dinner." Democrats abetting intimidation are destroying civil society. Biden administration to discipline border agents falsely accused of "whipping" migrants. Fox News' Lisa Boothe has some choice words for Joe Biden. Jesse Kelly, syndicated radio host of the Jesse Kelly Show, joins Clay and Buck to discuss Biden's communist-style purge of the National Guard and the military, the Dutch government attacking their farmers -- and to defend his cheeseburger recipe. NPR compares WNBA and NBA salaries. WNBA star Brittney Griner pleads guilty to Russian drug charge.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
